text.part1: Hello, my name is Cyril, I am
text.part2: years old, and I am an IT Project Manager at AFR Financement in Villeneuve-Saint-Germain.
text.part3: I manage and coordinate IT projects, overseeing the development and security of internal digital tools. My role covers all project phases, from requirements analysis to deployment.
text.part4: I work with developers and business teams to design tailored solutions while ensuring the evolution and maintenance of applications, websites, and APIs.
text.part5: My expertise includes complex web solutions, API integration, data flow management, and security reinforcement.
text.part6: Feel free to explore my portfolio!

afr-cp.job: IT Project Manager • AFR Financement • Villeneuve-Saint-Germain
afr-cp.part1: Management and coordination of IT projects, from requirements analysis to deployment, including planning, development, and progress tracking. Supervision of internal and external development teams to ensure high-quality deliveries within set deadlines.
afr-cp.part2: Design, enhancement, and maintenance of internal applications, websites, and APIs. Identifying optimization opportunities and proposing solutions to improve performance and efficiency.
afr-cp.part3: Technology watch and strategic recommendations to optimize IT systems and enhance user experience.
afr-cp.part4: IT security management: defining security standards and implementing protocols to protect sensitive data.

afr-fs.part1: Development and maintenance of web applications for the AFR Financement franchise.
afr-fs.part3:
Network management and system administration:
  • Configuration of websites on Windows Server.
  • Scheduling of automated tasks for backups and report generation.
afr-fs.part4: Design and maintenance of strategic web solutions to improve broker efficiency and automate key processes.

emiled.part1: Participation in projects aimed at strengthening customer loyalty and improving user experience on e-commerce platforms.
emiled.part2: Optimization and maintenance of multi-store websites on Magento, including analysis and resolution of reported functional issues.
emiled.part3: Testing and validation of an online product customization solution, along with the creation of video tutorials to assist end-users.
emiled.part4: Management of mailing campaigns using Mailchimp, from content design to sending, supporting marketing actions.
emiled.part5: Creation of various graphic materials using Photoshop, in line with marketing needs and product customization.

insset.part1: Degree obtained: Master’s in Cloud Computing & Mobility • Honors.
insset.description1: This Master's program trains experts in mobile development, microservices, and cloud solutions. The curriculum focuses on security, IoT, and project management, preparing students for roles as engineers, project managers, or specialized consultants.
insset.description2: The Bachelor's in Digital Professions at INSSET in Saint-Quentin trains students in digital, web, and cloud technologies, with skills in application development, databases, and machine learning.

claudel.part1: Degree obtained: BTS in IT Services for Organizations • Honors.
claudel.description: The BTS SIO program prepares students to design, develop, and maintain software solutions tailored to business needs. The Software Solutions and Business Applications option emphasizes development technologies, database management, and business needs analysis.

nerval.description:
The STMG Baccalaureate, with a specialization in Information Systems Management, provides an in-depth introduction to web development and data management. 
 The cinema-audiovisual option enriches my background with a creative and technical approach to audiovisual production.
